title: Build and deploy a full-stack web app
description: Generates a TypeScript/Next.js CRUD app, sets up Supabase, and deploys to Vercel preview.

title: Debug failing Python tests
description: Clone repo, reproduce failing pytest suite, patch code, and push fix branch.

title: Translate analytics question to SQL
description: Use DuckDB or Snowflake to run optimized SQL, produce chart, and summarize insights.

title: Nonlinear physics simulation
description: Compare symplectic integrators vs. neural ODEs via Modal GPU runners and produce plots.

title: Issue-to-PR automation
description: Read GitHub issue, create branch, implement fix, run CI gates, and open PR.
